Tool

NameK-Nearest Neighbours Classification (OpenCV)
ID6
AuthorO.Conrad (c) 2016
Specificationgrid

Description

Integration of the OpenCV Machine Learning library for K-Nearest Neighbours classification of gridded features. Open Source Computer Vision
